creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: slightly abstracted image of blonde woman wearing a tan dress and brown shoes in LRC, looking out over silhouettes of buildings and small areas of land with three threes at left; curving rows of white dots of various sizes around center; muted shades of green, tan, rust-red, and light brown
inscription: bottom center, in pencil: [untranslated inscription] | LLC, in pencil: 25/25
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Even without words
